staves.name: Staff of Fire
text: This staff resembles a blackened and burned length of ashen wood. It smells faintly of soot and glows as if lit by embers. You can use an Interact action to touch the tip of this staff to a torch, tinder, or a flammable substance to ignite a flame.
staves.Effect: You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
staves.Craft Requirements: Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

staves.Effect: You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
staves.Craft Requirements: Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

staves.name: Staff of Healing
text: Made of smooth, white wood, this staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with a multitude of ruby cabochons. A staff of healing grants an item bonus to the Hit Points you restore anytime you cast the
spell using your own spell slots or using charges from the staff.
The item bonus granted to
spells is +1.
staves.Effect: You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
staves.Craft Requirements: Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

staves.name: Staff of Illumination
text: This simple iron staff is capped with a faceted, clear gem.
staves.Effect: You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
staves.Craft Requirements: Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

staves.name: Staff of Power
text: This staff of magically hardened wood is topped with a silver sculpture depicting magical runic symbols. When used as a weapon, a staff of power is a +2 greater striking staff.

Voluntarily destroying a staff of power unleashes an incredible blast of energy. When wielding the staff, you can Interact to break it. This releases a 30-foot-burst magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals 2d8 force damage per charge remaining in the staff (DC 40 basic Reflex save). You automatically critically fail your save. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.
staves.Effect: You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
spells: 7th cone of cold, fireball, lightning bolt
staves.Craft Requirements: Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

staves.name: Staff of the Magi
text: Sigils and runes of ancient and powerful magic cover the iron cladding on this long wooden staff. A staff of the magi is a +3 major striking staff, and when wielding it you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells.

Voluntarily destroying a staff of the magi unleashes a truly devastating wave of arcane energy that surges out, dissipating with distance. When wielding the staff, you can break it using an Interact action. This releases a 30-foot‑burst magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals 2d10 force damage per charge remaining in the staff (DC 40 basic Reflex save), You automatically critically fail your save. The explosion continues to echo beyond the initial blast zone, dealing half as much damage to creatures beyond 30 feet but within a 60-foot burst. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.
staves.Effect: You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
spells: Cantrip detect magic, light, mage hand, telekinetic projectile
2nd enlarge, glitterdust, invisibility, knock, telekinetic maneuver, web
4th invisibility, enlarge, fireball, wall of fire, web
5th cone of cold, passwall, telekinetic haul
6th disintegrate, dispel magic, fireball, lightning bolt
7th cone of cold, passwall, plane shift, wall of fire
9th dispel magic, meteor swarm, summon dragon
staves.Craft Requirements: Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
